description:
Sakamichi takes on Manami in the final climb before the finish line! Sakamichi rides to fulfill his teammate`s hopes and carry their jersey across the finish line, while Manami rides to overcome his past and fulfill his promise to erase last year`s disgrace. With their respective hopes in their hearts, they ride all out as they draw on whatever strength they have left. The others watch on as their wheels finally cross the finish line! The long three-day Inter-High is finally over. The champion who raises his hands up to the sky is...!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oozora ni Te o Ageta Mono
The Man Who Raised His Hands up to the Sky
